GET /accounts/{identifier}/alerting/v3/d.description: Gets a list of all configured webhook destinations.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the webhook destination was created.

last_failure.description: Timestamp of the last time an attempt to dispatch a notification to this webhook failed.

last_success.description: Timestamp of the last time Cloudflare was able to successfully dispatch a notification using this webhook.

name.description: The name of the webhook destination. This will be included in the request body when you receive a webhook notification.

secret.description: Optional secret that will be passed in the `cf-webhook-auth` header when dispatching a webhook notification. Secrets are not returned in any API response body.

url.description: The POST endpoint to call when dispatching a notification.
